iti84:0.4: 84. For the Welfare of the People
iti84:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti84:2.1: “Three people, mendicants, arise in the world for the welfare and happiness of the people, for the benefit, welfare, and happiness of gods and humans.
iti84:2.3: It’s when a Realized One arises in the world, perfected, a fully awakened Buddha, accomplished in knowledge and conduct, holy, knower of the world, supreme guide for those who wish to train, teacher of gods and humans, awakened, blessed.
